value.string: If logging not enabled, display log entry in message box, and exit.
Check if Event Handler being used.
If so, any ERROR log types should be called only from Raise Process Event.
Date/time format for logging transactions is missing
Process Execution Start Time is missing
File & Folder Path Attributes Dictionary Is Empty
Ensure Event Log Path exists, if need to log to Event Log.
Check if called properly if using Event Handler.
If using Event Handler, Error MUST come from Raise Process Event
LOGINFO - Please call RaiseEvent, not LogInfo, to raise error events
LOGINFO - Error Line must be supplied to log an Error..
For events, RaiseEvent should be logged, which will then call LogInfo.
LogInfo should *not* be called directly for events.
The iStrTaskBotName will contain /Raise Process Event if called by RaiseEvent.
LOGINFO - Please call RaiseEvent, not LogInfo, to raise events (ERROR, EXCEPTION, EVENT)
LOGINFO - Event Code must be supplied to log an Event.
Task Bot Name,Bot Runner Host Name,Date/Time,Description
May be non-String values - don't try to add to Header
May be non-String values - don't try to add to Log
Debug log is super-set of Audit log - write anything in Audit also to Debug Log
Process Execution Start Time,Task Bot Name,Bot Runner Host Name,Date/Time,Description
Process Execution Start Time,Task Bot Name,Bot Runner Host Name,Date/Time,Description.
Process Execution Start Time,Task Bot Name,Bot Runner Host Name,Date/Time,Description,Error Line Number
Bot Runner Host,Process Execution Start Time,Task Name,Event Code,Error Line,Description,Transaction Time,Comments

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

variables.name: iStrTaskBotName
variables.description: Name of TaskBot that is logging the information.

variables.name: iStrEventType
variables.description: Type of event (ie ERROR, EXCEPTION, GENERAL).  Optional unless called by RaiseEvent.

variables.name: pBoolUseEventConfig
variables.description: TRUE if the automation calling this Bot is using Excel-configurable Event Handler.

variables.name: pStrDateTimeFormatTransactions
variables.description: Date format for logging transactions in log files (date and time with seconds)
